channel.title: Can't grab ladder, after minefield in Surface Tension [Fixed]
channel.description: After the minefield in Surface Tension, I am unable to grab/mount the ladder to descend in to the hatch. I am forced to drop the full height. On my first attempt that landed me on some dirt and I took damage. The 2nd attempt (to confirm it wasn't just me sucking) I landed in water and was spared the damage, but I was still unable to use the otherwise perfectly good ladder.

item.title: Can't grab ladder, after minefield in Surface Tension [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: The_MAZZTer
item.description:
In general I’ve noticed ladder mounting is a bit tricky in BM.

I think this ladder I also ended up falling, but I ended up in the water so I didn’t bother to go back and try again.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't grab ladder, after minefield in Surface Tension [Fixed]
